title: Tennis Podcast: Elina Svitolina stars at the WTA Finals but Bianca Andreescu is injured again
text:
As for Andreescu, what did her on-court coaching exchange with Sylvain Bruneau reveal about her character? Should she have stopped playing immediately after getting hurt? And, in general, does she call for the trainer too often?

Elsewhere, there’s also debate over on-court coaching, and chat about the colour and speed of the court in Shenzhen, Roger Federer’s decision to withdraw from the ATP Cup, and Jack Sock losing his ATP singles ranking.

The Tennis Podcast is produced in association with Telegraph Sport, weekly throughout the year, and daily during all four Grand Slams, the WTA and ATP Finals, and the Fed and Davis Cup Finals. Each season of the show is crowdfunded by its listeners every December.
description: The Tennis Podcast team discuss the major talking points from Wednesday’s action at the WTA Finals, including yet another win for defending champion Elina Svitolina, and the knee injury which forced Bianca Andreescu to retire against Karolina Pliskova.
